Here is a bullet list of required visual elements:

*   A rectangle containing the text "Campus network is breached".
*   A rectangle containing the text "Student data leaks".
*   A rectangle containing the text "Loss of teaching materials".
*   A rectangle containing the text "Damage to the school's reputation".
*   A rectangle containing the text "Decline in student enrollment".
*   An arrow from the "Campus network is breached" rectangle to the "Student data leaks" rectangle.
*   An arrow from the "Campus network is breached" rectangle to the "Loss of teaching materials" rectangle.
*   An arrow from the "Campus network is breached" rectangle to the "Damage to the school's reputation" rectangle.
*   An arrow from the "Damage to the school's reputation" rectangle to the "Decline in student enrollment" rectangle.
